column4: hey all! Quick Q: I just discovered a "hack" to make it so the openoffice.org2 packages from hoary can be VERY easily replaced with any new beta.. How can I disseminate this? (mv /usr/lib/openoffice2 /usr/lib/openoffice2-old ; ln -s /opt/openoffice.org1.9.105 /usr/lib/openoffice2)
post it on the forums, wiki, or something liek that.
